about_the_game: Download the Lindner Geotrac 134ep DLC and get access to the most powerful tractor Lindner has ever produced.
detailed_description: Download the Lindner Geotrac 134ep DLC and get access to the most powerful tractor Lindner has ever produced.
legal_notice: Pure Farming 2018 © 2017 Techland Sp. z o.o.. Publié par Techland Publishing. développé par IceFlames au moyen du moteur Unity Technology. Pure Farming et Techland sont des marques de commerce ou des marques déposées de Techland Sp. z o.o.
name: Pure Farming 2018 - Lindner Geotrac 134ep

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 10,8,7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 2,3 GHZ or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 560 GTX 2 GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 10,8
  • Processor: Intel Core I7, 3,0 GHZ or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 4 GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: Download the Lindner Geotrac 134ep DLC and get access to the most powerful tractor Lindner has ever produced.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian
*languages with full audio support
